name: Atlantis: Mysteries of Ancient Inventors
summary:
Ancient civilizations and their ruins hold many puzzles and mysteries.

A young ambitious archeologist suddenly discovers a fragment of the lost map to the treasures of the most mysterious land – Atlantis! Leading her to its remnant which protrudes from the dark waters; a remnant which surely holds hidden object and secrets, carefully concealed by priests for future generations.

Without a moment’s hesitation, Anna starts her adventure, taking everything she needs.

As part of her search, she will visit ancient cities and deserted caves as well as the sea bottom and ice deserts.

Many comical and entertaining moments await her. And amazing discoveries of course.
